actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Tallgrass Prairie National Park and the Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Tallgrass Prairie National Park and the Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve in the State of Kansas.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Tallgrass Prairie National Park and the Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve.
